activities.name: Get List of files in inbound
Loop for each file in inbound directory

dependsOn.activity: Get List of files in inbound

activities.name: Copy file from inbound to input

dependsOn.activity: Copy file from inbound to input
Copy file from inbound to input

activities.name: Mail if book file is missing

body.value:
@concat('{
    "EmailTo":"',activity('parameter').output.firstRow.mail,'",
    "Subject":"An error has occured in the {',pipeline().Pipeline, '} -pipeline for file- {',variables('filename'),'}",
    "DataFactoryName":"',pipeline().DataFactory,'",
    "PipelineName":"',pipeline().Pipeline,'",
    "Activity":"Unable to copy files from inbound to input directory",
    "ErrorMessage":"File Missing from inbound directory",
    "FileName":"',activity('parameter').output.firstRow.book ,'"}')
